Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.expr.IAeExpressionValidator

Packages that use IAeExpressionValidator
org.activebpel.rt.bpel This package contains classes for creating a BPEL model and for implements a standalone BPEL engine for testing designs. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.expr This package contains classes which support validation of expressions. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.expr.xpath This package contains classes which support validation of expressions written in the xpath language. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.expressions This package contains validation model implementation classes for expression based validation. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.expr   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.validation.javascript This package contains classes which support validation of expressions written in the javascript language. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.validation.xquery This package contains classes which support validation of expressions written in the xquery language.

Methods in org.activebpel.rt.bpel that return IAeExpressionValidator
 IAeExpressionValidator IAeExpressionLanguageFactory.createExpressionValidator(java.lang.String aBpelNamespace, java.lang.String aLanguageUri)
          Given a language identifier found in the 'expressionLanguage' attribute of the BPEL 'process' element (or in a child BPEL constructs in 2.0), returns an expression validator capable of validating expressions written in that language.
